ComicInfo.Summary:
The new Authority cracks the riddle of Re-Space, and launch an offensive against those responsible for the chaos back on Earth. But it may be too little, too late, as tempers flare, one member goes M.I.A, and the pressure of new responsibility drives another to break down. All this, plus special surprise guests and...the return of Jenny Sparks?!?!
